Class ec.e.util.IndirectEnumeration 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.e.util.IndirectEnumeration
public class IndirectEnumeration
extends Object
implements Enumeration
A utility class that provides an Enumeration of things referenced by the elements of another Enumeration.

IndirectEnumeration(Enumeration)
Construct an IndirectEnumeration from an Enumeration.

hasMoreElements()
Test if this Enumeration has more elements.
nextElement()
Get the next element in this Enumeration.

IndirectEnumeration 
  public IndirectEnumeration(Enumeration enum)
Construct an IndirectEnumeration from an Enumeration.
Parameters:
enum - The Enumeration to enumerate with indirection applied. Its elements should all implement the IndirectElement interface.

hasMoreElements 
  public boolean hasMoreElements()
Test if this Enumeration has more elements.
Returns:
true iff we're not done yet.
nextElement 
  public Object nextElement()
Get the next element in this Enumeration.
Returns:
The next (indirect) element in the Enumeration.
